featured.text: All we hear is the scratching of pencil on paper, the sound of pigeons, and the delivery of inter-office correspondence by paper airplane. Wonderful!

definition.zh_def: 埋葬，通常指將屍體放入墓中或其他安葬方式。
definition.en_def: To place (a dead body) in a grave or tomb; to bury.
definition.example: They decided to inter their beloved pet in the backyard.
